content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":10562,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fbc5f88b-3c03-4166-a6f4-a8e3bf2dd994/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fbc5f88b-3c03-4166-a6f4-a8e3bf2dd994/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"compensation.png\",\"name\":\"compensation.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"fbc5f88b-3c03-4166-a6f4-a8e3bf2dd994\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1023,\"height\":90},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You salary is paid \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"twice a month:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- for the first half of the month - till 15th of the month;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- for the second half of the month - till the last working day of the month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of any questions or issues, drop an email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"wfaanywheresalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWFA Anywhere Salary\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Please note that the answer might require five business days.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
